content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) with status NO_INGREDIENTS and fuel inventory containing 18 coal.
- Stone furnace (position (2.0, 0.0)) with status NO_INGREDIENTS and fuel inventory containing 6 coal.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. This includes checking if the position is occupied by another entity.

### Errors when retrieving entities
- Verify the position of the entity you are trying to retrieve. If the entity is not found, it may be due to incorrect coordinates or the entity not existing at that position.

### Errors when crafting
- Ensure you have enough resources to craft the desired item. Check your inventory before attempting to craft.
- Ensure the required sub-ingredients for crafting are available and can be crafted.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt. If the furnace is showing NO_INGREDIENTS, it means it cannot process any items.
- Ensure the furnace's inventory is not full before attempting to insert items. If the inventory is full, the insertion will fail.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure there are enough items in the furnace to extract. If there are not enough items, the extraction will fail.
